WorkItem.Description:
Great walkthrough! Hovewer, little comment:
Page 55
"We use the [HttpPost] attribute to indicate that this form will only respond to the HTTP-POST 
method, so it is only displayed when a user submits the form. "

"so it is only displayed when a user submits the form" - would be better to rephrase or remove this. It is not clear what is displayed. We just return ActionResult. It may be a RedirectToRouteResult or ViewResult  depending on the action execution.

Comments.Message: Thanks! This is fixed in an update to the walkthrough, which should be out pretty soon. Please let me know of any other things you find!
